languages.text: {n}Торбальд довольно похохатывает:{/n} "Это так, дружеские укусы. Если бы мы друг друга ненавидели, кровь давно расписала бы стены сего славного чертога. Такова натура воина, волчья натура — всякую силу мы пробуем на зуб".

{n}Thorbald chuckles.{/n} "It is only friendly nipping. If there was hatred between us, the walls of this glorious hall would have long since been painted with blood. Such is a warrior's nature, a Wolf's nature — when we meet with strength, we test our teeth on it."
languages.original_text: {n}Торбальд довольно похохатывает:{/n} "Это так, дружеские укусы. Если бы мы друг друга ненавидели, кровь давно расписала бы стены сего славного чертога. Такова натура воина, волчья натура — всякую силу мы пробуем на зуб".

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald chuckles.{/n} "It is only friendly nipping. If there was hatred between us, the walls of this glorious hall would have long since been painted with blood. Such is a warrior's nature, a Wolf's nature — when we meet with strength, we test our teeth on it."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald chuckles.{/n} "It is only friendly nipping. If there was hatred between us, the walls of this glorious hall would have long since been painted with blood. Such is a warrior's nature, a Wolf's nature — when we meet with strength, we test our teeth on it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald chuckles.{/n} "It is only friendly nipping. If there was hatred between us, the walls of this glorious hall would have long since been painted with blood. Such is a warrior's nature, a Wolf's nature — when we meet with strength, we test our teeth on it."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}索巴德笑了起来。{/n}“这只是友好的嬉戏而已。如果我们之间真的有什么深仇大恨，这座漂亮的大厅恐怕早都鲜血四溅了。这就是战士的天性，我们狼的天性。当我们遇到强大的对手时，我们会用牙齿进行试探。”
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald chuckles.{/n} "It is only friendly nipping. If there was hatred between us, the walls of this glorious hall would have long since been painted with blood. Such is a warrior's nature, a Wolf's nature — when we meet with strength, we test our teeth on it."

traits.locale_text: {n}索巴德笑了起来。{/n}“这只是友好的嬉戏而已。如果我们之间真的有什么深仇大恨，这座漂亮的大厅恐怕早都鲜血四溅了。这就是战士的天性，我们狼的天性。当我们遇到强大的对手时，我们会用牙齿进行试探。”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}トールバルドがくすくす笑う。{/n}「ただのじゃれ合いだよ。互いに毛嫌いしてるなら、この栄光の間の壁は血塗れになってしばらく経ってるだろうさ。戦士の性、狼の性ってヤツさ。強い相手に会ったら噛みついてみるんだよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald chuckles.{/n} "It is only friendly nipping. If there was hatred between us, the walls of this glorious hall would have long since been painted with blood. Such is a warrior's nature, a Wolf's nature — when we meet with strength, we test our teeth on it."

traits.locale_text: {n}トールバルドがくすくす笑う。{/n}「ただのじゃれ合いだよ。互いに毛嫌いしてるなら、この栄光の間の壁は血塗れになってしばらく経ってるだろうさ。戦士の性、狼の性ってヤツさ。強い相手に会ったら噛みついてみるんだよ」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald se ríe.{/n} «Es una riña entre amigos. Si nos odiáramos, los muros de este glorioso salón llevarían siglos teñidos de sangre. Así somos los guerreros y, por tanto, los Lobos: cuando nos medimos en fuerzas, nos gusta hincarnos los dientes».
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald chuckles.{/n} "It is only friendly nipping. If there was hatred between us, the walls of this glorious hall would have long since been painted with blood. Such is a warrior's nature, a Wolf's nature — when we meet with strength, we test our teeth on it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald se ríe.{/n} «Es una riña entre amigos. Si nos odiáramos, los muros de este glorioso salón llevarían siglos teñidos de sangre. Así somos los guerreros y, por tanto, los Lobos: cuando nos medimos en fuerzas, nos gusta hincarnos los dientes».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald pousse un petit rire.{/n} « Simples piques amicales. S'il y avait la moindre haine entre nous, les murs de cette salle glorieuse dégoulineraient de sang depuis longtemps. Telle est la nature d'un guerrier et d'un Loup : nous éprouvons de nos crocs toute démonstration de force. »
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald chuckles.{/n} "It is only friendly nipping. If there was hatred between us, the walls of this glorious hall would have long since been painted with blood. Such is a warrior's nature, a Wolf's nature — when we meet with strength, we test our teeth on it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald pousse un petit rire.{/n} « Simples piques amicales. S'il y avait la moindre haine entre nous, les murs de cette salle glorieuse dégoulineraient de sang depuis longtemps. Telle est la nature d'un guerrier et d'un Loup : nous éprouvons de nos crocs toute démonstration de force. »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald kichert.{/n} "Das ist nur freundschaftliche Kabbelei. Würden wir einander hassen, wären die Wände dieser ruhmreichen Halle längst voller Blut. Das ist eben die Natur von Kriegern, von Wölfen – sie treffen einander und müssen sich messen."
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald chuckles.{/n} "It is only friendly nipping. If there was hatred between us, the walls of this glorious hall would have long since been painted with blood. Such is a warrior's nature, a Wolf's nature — when we meet with strength, we test our teeth on it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald kichert.{/n} "Das ist nur freundschaftliche Kabbelei. Würden wir einander hassen, wären die Wände dieser ruhmreichen Halle längst voller Blut. Das ist eben die Natur von Kriegern, von Wölfen – sie treffen einander und müssen sich messen."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald kıkırdıyor.{/n} "Birbirimize takılıyoruz. Aramızda nefret olsaydı bu şanlı salonun duvarları çoktan kanla boyanırdı. Savaşçıların ve Kurtların doğası böyledir. Karşımızda güçlü birini gördüğümüzde meydan okuruz."
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald chuckles.{/n} "It is only friendly nipping. If there was hatred between us, the walls of this glorious hall would have long since been painted with blood. Such is a warrior's nature, a Wolf's nature — when we meet with strength, we test our teeth on it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald kıkırdıyor.{/n} "Birbirimize takılıyoruz. Aramızda nefret olsaydı bu şanlı salonun duvarları çoktan kanla boyanmış olurdu. Savaşçıların ve Kurtların doğası böyledir. Karşımızda güçlü birini gördüğümüzde ona meydan okuruz."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil
